briefTitle: A Long-term Safety Study of QMF149 in Japanese Participants With Asthma
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label, Single Arm, 52-week Treatment Study to Assess the Safety of QMF149 in Japanese Patients With Asthma
summary: The purpose of this study was to provide long term safety data of QMF149 in Japanese participants with inadequately controlled asthma for the registration of QMF149 in Japan.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
